item.title: Google unveils open source Gemma 3 model with 128k context window
item.description: Google's Gemma 3 is multimodal, comes in four sizes and can now handle more information and instructions thanks to a larger context window.

item.title: Sony testing AI to drive PlayStation characters
item.description: PlayStation characters may one day engage you in theoretically endless conversations, if a new internal technology video bares out.

item.title: OpenAI unveils Responses API, open source Agents SDK, letting developers build their own Deep Research and Operator
item.description: OpenAI is also making its web search, file search and computer use tools available directly through the responses API.

item.title: Anthropic’s stealth enterprise coup: How Claude 3.7 is becoming the coding agent of choice
item.description: Anthropic is positioning Claude as the LLM that matters most for enterprise companies. Claude 3.7 Sonnet, released just two weeks ago, set new benchma...

item.title: AI vs. AI: 6 ways enterprises are automating cybersecurity to counter AI-powered attacks
item.description: AI-powered cybersecurity threats include deepfakes, automating breaches, and morphing malware in real time, challenging cyberdefenses.
